evidence.claim: Luxe Homecare mentions adherence to HIPAA regulations on their security page.
Luxe Homecare utilizes FHIR standards for healthcare data interchange.
The company references HL7 guidelines on their developer documentation.
Luxe Homecare is involved in health data management which requires EDI compliance.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 or API automation related to healthcare data exchange on the site.
